translator_menu_options: Explanation of the translator menu buttons
user_menu_options: Explanation of the user menu buttons
contact_admin_explanation: Use this button to contact the administrator for support and inquiries.
view_sentences_explanation: Use this button to view a list of all sentences available in our bot.
write_sentence_explanation: Use this button to write a new sentence and upload a video of its sign language translation.
edit_sentences_explanation: View the videos you uploaded along with their corresponding translations, and edit your videos.
vote_explanation: Use this button to watch a randomly selected video and its corresponding translated sentence. You can like or dislike to indicate whether the translation is correct.
code_for_translator_explanation: Use this button to generate a six-digit one-time code. If you want to invite someone to join as a translator, share this code with them.
request_video_explanation: When you use this button, you will see a sentence and a video with its sign language translation. You should record and send the same video.
view_videos_explanation: You can review your uploaded videos, edit them, and see the number of votes given by translators.
show_my_rank_explanation: Check your ranking based on your contributions to translations.
